li.label: Savage Strength
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} channels the raw ferocity of a beast, striking with untamed power. {PAWN_pronoun}'s attacks land with overwhelming force, embodying the primal essence of combat.

li.label: Savage Speed
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with wild, untamed agility, weaving through battle like a beast on the hunt. {PAWN_pronoun} is an unpredictable force, always striking before prey can react.

li.label: Wild Tamer
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} shares an instinctual bond with nature's beasts, understanding their primal instincts as if one of their own. {PAWN_pronoun} tames even the wildest creatures with sheer presence.

li.label: Beastly Endurance
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} endures pain and exhaustion like a true beast, pushing beyond normal limits. Even in relentless battle, {PAWN_pronoun} refuses to falter.

li.label: Feral Resilience
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} thrives in the harshest environments, shrugging off toxins and filth like a beast born to the wild. Nothing weakens {PAWN_pronoun}'s untamed spirit.

li.label: Primal Cooking
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has mastered the art of survival, expertly preparing meals using every part of the hunt. {PAWN_pronoun} wastes nothing, ensuring the pack stays strong.

li.label: Beastly Presence
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes a primal aura, commanding attention and respect. {PAWN_pronoun}'s untamed spirit drives others to follow, inspired by raw, instinctual energy.

li.label: Primal Instinct
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} possesses an innate understanding of wounds and survival, treating injuries with an almost beast-like intuition. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures the pack recovers swiftly.

li.label: Wild Hunter
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} understands nature's rhythms, thriving in the wilderness. Under {PAWN_possessive} care, the land flourishes, providing bountiful sustenance.
